revision.text:
{{wiktionary|Aberdeen}} '''[[Aberdeen]]''' is a city in Scotland, United Kingdom.
'''Aberdeen''' may also refer to: {{TOCright}}
== Aberdeen, Scotland == Aberdeen, Scotland, is home of: * [[Aberdeen (HM Prison)]] * [[Aberdeen F.C.]] * [[Aberdeen railway station]] * [[University of Aberdeen]]
==Africa== ;Sierra Leone * [[Aberdeen, Sierra Leone]] ;South Africa * [[Aberdeen, Eastern Cape]]
==Asia== ;Hong Kong * [[Aberdeen, Hong Kong]] ;Sri Lanka * [[Aberdeen, Sri Lanka]]
==Australia== * [[Aberdeen, New South Wales]] ** [[Aberdeen railway station, New South Wales]] * [[Aberdeen, Tasmania]], place with a [[Scottish place names in Australia#Tasmania|Scottish placename in Tasmania, Australia]]
==Europe== * [[Aberdeen (UK Parliament constituency)]] 1832-1885 * [[Aberdeen Burghs (UK Parliament constituency)]] 1801-1832 * [[Aberdeen Central (Scottish Parliament constituency)]] * [[Aberdeen Central (UK Parliament constituency)]]
==North America== ;Canada * [[Aberdeen, Kamloops]], an area in the City of Kamloops, British Columbia * [[Aberdeen, Abbotsford]], a neighbourhood in the City of Abbotsford, British Columbia * [[Aberdeen Parish, New Brunswick]] * [[Aberdeen, Nova Scotia]], part of the Municipality of Inverness County, Nova Scotia * [[Aberdeen, Grey County, Ontario]] * [[Aberdeen, Saskatchewan]] * [[Aberdeen No. 373, Saskatchewan]] * Aberdeen, community in the township of [[Champlain, Ontario|Champlain]], Prescott and Russell County, Ontario * Aberdeen Township, Quebec, until 1960 part of Sheen-Esher-Aberdeen-et-Malakoff, now part of [[Rapides-des-Joachims, Quebec]] ;United States of America * [[Aberdeen, Arkansas]], [[List of places in Arkansas: A|place in Arkansas]] * [[Aberdeen, California]] * [[Aberdeen, Florida]] * [[Aberdeen, Georgia]], [[List of places in Georgia (U.S. state): A-D|place in Georgia]] * [[Aberdeen, Idaho]] * [[Aberdeen, Indiana]], in [[Ohio County, Indiana|Ohio County]] * [[Aberdeen, Maryland]] ** [[Aberdeen (Amtrak station)]] ** [[Aberdeen IronBirds]], baseball team * [[Aberdeen, Mississippi]] * [[Aberdeen, Montana]], place near [[Interstate 90 in Montana]] * [[Aberdeen Township, New Jersey]] * [[Aberdeen, North Carolina]] * [[Aberdeen, Ohio]] * [[Aberdeen, Pennsylvania]], [[List of places in Pennsylvania: A|place in Pennsylvania]] * [[Aberdeen, South Dakota]] * [[Aberdeen, Washington]] * [[Aberdeen, West Virginia]]
==Other== * Some members of the [[Marquess of Aberdeen and Temair]] house * [[Aberdeen (band)]], an American rock band * [[Aberdeen City (band)]], Boston based indie/alternative rock band. * [[Aberdeen (film)]], a film (2000) directed by Hans Petter Moland, starring Stellan Skarsgård and Lena Headey * [[Aberdeen Asset Management]], an investment management group * [[Aberdeen Station (TransLink)]], SkyTrain station on the Canada Line in Richmond, British Columbia, Canada * [[Aberdeen Group]], an IT-consulting firm * Aberdeen LLC, a [[List of NAS manufacturers|server and storage server computer system manufacturer]]
==See also== *[[Aberdeen City (disambiguation)]]
